title: Hue
author: Birch
content:
There’re roamers on the hue.
One stands with calm,
while the other lights up the warm.

Contrast forms boundaries.
Under stare, barriers melt into shades,
arousing fierce tides.

Lights will not last.
Then the colors dim to void.
System throws every exceptions,
but no catcher behind.

The hue, hue stuck in stacks,
gains colors with another reboot.
